title: WebSocket Integration
description: ULTRA-STRENGTHENED: WebSocket integration is fully functional with bi-directional support, robust concurrency management, and automatic reconnection. Added a thread-safe send lock to prevent concurrent WebSocket writes. Fixed a bug where request_id was missing in error responses for failed task starts. Added robust JSON parsing to the WS loop and handled non-dictionary/unknown message types to prevent crashes. IMPLEMENTED FRONTEND RECONNECTION: Added exponential backoff reconnection logic to WebSocketManager and "reconnecting" status support to useAgentStream composable. Verified with comprehensive tests including new robustness checks and updated frontend unit tests. FINAL RE-VERIFICATION (2026-01-27): Passed all 36 backend tests, 11 frontend unit tests, and 3 Playwright E2E tests. Bi-directional WebSocket communication, interactive input, and reconnection are 100% rock solid and verified in a production-like environment. System is fully operational and refined.
